title: Light Lens Lab Recreated Another Legendary Leica Lens for a Fraction of the Price
description: Light Lens Lab's latest lens, the 35mm f/1.4 Aspherical "11873" for M-Mount, is now available for preorder. The lens is a modern recreation of the legendary Leica Summilux 35mm f/1.4 double-sided aspherical lens from the late 1980s, which can sell for nearly $18,000 in good condition. Light Lens Lab's new prime lenses start at $1,399.[Read More]

title: DJI Will Be Banned in the US in 43 Days as the Government Does Nothing
description: DJI is facing an outright ban in the United States if an audit mandated by the National Defense Authorization Act doesn't take place. The government has not started the audit despite the fact that it has been almost a year, and even if it does so now, that doesn't mean DJI is in the clear.[Read More]
